page.title: 05RUDDINGTON HALLS AND LIBRARY
page.content: In {RUDDINGTON}we have four halls that are available for hire by applying to {Jean Gough}in the{St. Peter's Rooms. This hall is used every night for clubs like the Winemakers, Bridge Club and dancing lessons. The {Village Hall} is used by a play-group and for badminton,ballet classes and dances . The {Hermitage Meeting Room}is hired by the History Society, Guides, Brownies and the Women's Institute. The{Starlight Rooms}are used for parties and dances. The {LIBRARY}was opened in{1963}and it is on Church Street and is open every day except Wednesdays.It has over 18,000 books and 400 records.
